{{infobox character | people=[[Gondorians|Gondorian]] | name=Arciryas | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Gondor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Westron]] | birth=After {{TA|1684}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Anárion]] | parentage=[[Telumehtar Umbardacil|Telumehtar]] | siblings=[[Narmacil II|Narmacil]] | spouse= | children=[[Calimmacil]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Arciryas''' ([[Quenya|Q]], pron. {{IPA|[ˈarkirʲas]}}) was the younger brother of King [[Narmacil II]]. His great-grandson [[Eärnil II|Eärnil]] would become [[King of Gondor]] after King [[Ondoher]] and both of his sons perished in battle in {{TA|1944}}.{{App|Gondor}} ==Etymology== ''Arciryas'' is [[Quenya]]. Its meaning is not glossed, but as Paul Strack explains, it seems to mean "Noble Ship" and to be a compound of [[ara|(a)ra]] ("noble") and [[cirya]] ("ship").{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-2363379119.html|articlename=Q.
